description: CMake configuration error: Outdated cmake_minimum_required version specification. Requires updating CMake version argument due to removed compatibility with versions below 3.5.
Implicit function declarations for LayYYerror, free, and LayYYlex due to missing headers (stdlib.h not included). Compiler warnings indicate incompatible function declarations.
CMake configuration failure: Invalid cmake_minimum_required syntax. Requires updated version specification for modern CMake compatibility.
Multiple issues: Invalid option syntax in build script (add_optflags) and CMake version incompatibility in CMakeLists.txt (minimum required version outdated).
Critical CMake error: Missing cmake_minimum_required command in CMakeLists.txt. Project configuration requires explicit minimum CMake version declaration.
Implicit declarations of atoi and malloc functions due to missing stdlib.h include in source files, causing compilation errors.
CMake configuration failure: Deprecated cmake_minimum_required syntax. Requires updated version range specification for compatibility.
CMake policy errors: Use of obsolete CMP0005 policy with OLD behavior. Modern CMake requires NEW policy behavior for compatibility.
Compilation error: Incompatible pointer type in uncompress function call (Bytef* vs unsigned long*) causing type mismatch.
CMake configuration error: Invalid cmake_minimum_required version syntax. Requires modern version specification format.
